pr_title: chore(spring-boot/run): change context path of rest api

timeline.message:
chore(spring-boot/run): change context path of rest api

Introduces a fix in Camunda BPM Run, to make it possible to change the context path of the REST API filters dynamically.

related to CAM-11428

timeline.bodyText: This test class only checks same-origin requests. We should either add a test for a real cross-origin request or remove the configuration related to CORS as it does not have an effect here and could lead to confusion.
timeline.author: mboskamp

replies.bodyText: The idea of the test is to check if the path of the filter is changed correctly. I will add a comment to emphasize it.
replies.author: tasso94

timeline.bodyText: Is it ok to have this configuration run before JerseyAutoConfiguration if some Beans depend on JerseyApplicationPath?
timeline.author: mboskamp

replies.bodyText:
Let's remove the annotation:

It's semantically incorrect since it should be configured after Jersey
Spring Boot seems to be smart enough to figure out the right order of the config classes
replies.author: tasso94
